contents.title: Giffyglyph's Masterful Monk
contents.blurb:
You are a monk, a master of martial arts and mystic ki. With meditation and mantras, you channel the spiritual energies that flow through your body into supernatural power. But as you strike out into the world, what kind of monk will you choose to be?

Are you a fighter, overwhelming your enemies with fists of fury? Are you a spiritualist, forging connections with the energies of the world? Or are you a shadow, silently removing threats one life at a time?

Whatever your focus, Giffyglyph's Masterful Monk introduces new mechanics, features, and subclasses for your D&D 5e character. Add new 1st-10th level options to your campaign and head out into adventure.
features: Revised rules, features, and mechanics for levels 1-10.
Monk mantras—take your enemy's power and turn it against them with new, monk mantras.
Unleash your flurry of blows with lightning speed.
New subclasses and subclass options—choose your specialty from the very first level.
Recover your strength with a long rest.
Variant dials to customise your playstyle.
